name: Shannon Callaghan
title: I'm open to any and all positions.
coverLetter:
completely open, I have a clean record, great credit, reliable transportation, valid CA doctor’s recommendation, and a valid California driver’s license. I have had a passion for marijuana since I was 15 years old. I have experience trimming, weighing, and packing both concentrates and buds, in addition to 20+ years’ experience in the field of customer service.  I am a loyal and dedicated individual who has an ambition to succeed in any given environment. I take pride in having high professional and ethical standards. I am extremely organized, happy/drama free, experienced in fast-paced environments, with the ability to work with confidential and sensitive information. I hope you will consider my resume favorably, and look forward to hearing from you.


Shannon Callaghan
Contact: 818/720-7435
shannon_kathleen@yahoo.com
experience:
-Giving Trees Delivery - Van Nuys, CA - July 2017-Current - Packaging and delivery.
-Field 710 Concentrate - Los Angeles, CA - May 2017-Sept. 2017 - Packaging and delivery.

-The Walt Disney Company - Burbank, CA - January 2002-October 2012 - Corporate Risk Management Analyst
